website_summaries.verdict: These weights are friendly for your floors, your ears, and your wallet.
pros: Designed for low bounce and high durability
Gentler on floors than other materials
Good for a variety of exercise styles
cons: May arrive with a strong rubbery odor, but this fades over time

customer_reviews.title: Love these plates...
customer_reviews.text: Love these plates, have built up a sizable set over the past couple of years. IMO a good cost/quality balance for home use. I have never had any kind of smell issue...they've come with a very light coating of oily-feeling stuff that wipes off easily with a cloth moistened with window cleaner. My home gym is setup in my garage, I really need plates that won't damage the concrete floor or rubber mats...these completely fit that bill. I use these plates 4-5 times a week and they appear good as new.
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price, but do not bounce on concrete like nicer brands.
customer_reviews.text: For the price I would definitely buy these all over again instead of the extremely expensive brands. However, unlike the expensive brands they don't bounce on concrete the way you would expect when dropped. Feels more like dropping a rock. I Can build a platform to protect my garage floor cheaper than I can get the more expensive weight brands though, so I am happy with them. They fit standard 2 inch Olympic bars fyi.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Great Plate Weights, No Damage Even When Used on Concrete Garage Floors
customer_reviews.text: These work just fine and fit the standard barbell. I have had no issues with them abrading or scraping and sometimes I use them on a concrete garage floor (even though most of the time it is on the padded floor). There is a nice edge on them to lift up and hold as well. Overall great purchase, and I'll but other plates from this company when I'm ready!
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas B.Top Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Great Weights
customer_reviews.text: We have a small gym at work that maybe two employees use. I have been slowly building up the equipment out of my own money as I use it more than anyone else. These bumper plates have been used for deadlifts, squats, bench press, overhead press and many more standard weight lifting and crossfit style exercises. That being said I have had to bail on several lifts and they had no problem falling from about 6 feet up. I was more worried about my bar then the weights. I cant say how they would hold up in a gym were they were getting dumped regularly but for a small or home gym with a couple people they do great.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick452

customer_reviews.title: Too small uber rings
customer_reviews.text: Beware iner rings too small won't fit the bat the listing say uber run 2inches+50.80mm but I measured with my caliper and it reads 50.13. It's only the 45s and the 10s I asked if they want me to just send the 45s and the 10s back and the 25s fit. There replay was wat bar am I using. This is a manufature errer the rings are clearly to small. As of end of today I am on my 2nd day working with there customer service that is slow so far only one email today. I uped to a 4 star since the inter rings were below what was advertise the seller composited by sending me a new bar.
customer_reviews.author: Trista Kowell

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to our Metal Olympic Set
customer_reviews.text: We had a 300 pound metal Olympic set which is great for everything except Dead Lifting and Power Cleans. Our metal weights the 45 diameter was smaller than the typical 45 which threw us off for Dead Lifting and without the these rubber weights we could not have done Power Cleans. These are great and I would recommend to anyone!!
customer_reviews.author: AZ

customer_reviews.title: Durable and cheap
customer_reviews.text: Bought these a while back as they were a much cheaper alternative than the rubber plates at the local store and especially the expensive ones they use at the gym. I was worried the rubber might not last, but I’ve been dropping them on concrete for a few months now and it doesn’t seem to hurt it at all.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Our family is starting weight training. We had a ...
customer_reviews.text: Our family is starting weight training. We had a few pieces but needed to add to. This bumper plates are so much nicer than the old style weights. You can do different exercises with them. We will be ordering more!
customer_reviews.author: L. Roest

customer_reviews.title: Stinky weights? Bah...ultra exaggerated reviews. Excellent quality product!
customer_reviews.text: I'm very pleased. Packaged very nicely and beautifully constructed. Straight out of the box and plastic wrap and hardly any smell at all. Quickly wiped off the slight film using a paper towel and glass cleaner and it was good to go. Very sturdy, perfectly fitting steel rings for an olympic barbell (no jiggling), and very nice to handle. Go for it and don't let the negative reviews deter you. I'll be buying more.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonFanMan

customer_reviews.title: Price (not $4-$8 per lb like the competition ones) They fit snugly on an Olympic ...
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Price (not $4-$8 per lb like the competition ones) They fit snugly on an Olympic bar Don't clang and bang noisily like steal plates They don't crack or chip when you drop them lifting or accidentally Cons: None so far
customer_reviews.author: CP

customer_reviews.title: You get your moneys worth
customer_reviews.text: Decent set of bumper plates only been using them for a couple weeks, so well see how they hold up. Havent noticed any smell from them but i have them in the garage.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Stinky rubber but great bumper for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great price and quality is good. I bought some Titan Fitness bumpers and was really disappointed in the quality. The rubber had bubbles and it looked like someone took a knife to the edges and cut off rubber, but these ones by X Training were clean and in great quality. Haven't had any issues.
customer_reviews.author: Ronnie Roper

customer_reviews.title: Nice price for good bumpers
customer_reviews.text: I like these X Training bumpers as they are perfect for a home gym for crossfit, or any type of weightlifting workout you would do. They do have an oily smell to them, but the scent does go away after awhile. They are pretty solid bumpers.
customer_reviews.author: Donald A. Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Good for the money
customer_reviews.text: Nice product. I wish bumper plates were cheaper but it is what it is. Nice product in the bumper plate class. One of the cheaper priced brands.
customer_reviews.author: Batman

customer_reviews.title: Just like Rogue Echo Bumper Plates
customer_reviews.text: These plates are the next best thing to my rogue echo bumper plates. The coating of oil on it isn’t as bad as some people described in their reviews. They are a little thicker than the rogue echo 25 plates but just by a milimeter. For the price you can’t beat it.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Great product, great price
customer_reviews.text: Great product, work out outside so these are in the sun all day and so far holding up great. Nice fit and finish. Dropping no problems so far either although I have a rubber mat they land on.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Ann C. Sabino

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: No issues, they’re holding up great. People who complain of warping aren’t storing them correctly - user error, not product error.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Smith

customer_reviews.title: These are tough. I bought them not beacause I'm ...
customer_reviews.text: These are tough. I bought them not beacause I'm going to drop the bar but because I wanted to start my deadlifts and barbell rows from the right height without going to heavy to start. I have been impressed. One pair of ten can support over 205 pounds worth of iron.
customer_reviews.author: Bjorn Jacobson

customer_reviews.title: Smell so bad!!!
customer_reviews.text: The smell is horrible. I put them outside for a week and the smell is still there. I want to return it but there is no free return and the shipping cost is so expensive for these heavy plates.
customer_reviews.author: Claire

customer_reviews.title: Nice for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Was looking to start my home gym and found these. Not a very strong smell, which is common in bumpers. They bounce good, but i would recommend putting a rubber matting instead of straight concrete.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the set.
customer_reviews.text: Did have a little trouble slipping on the bar it was suppose to fit but finally worked them on. They do smell bad! Hopefully they will be as durable as they appear.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't fit on standard 2" barbell
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these and unfortunately did not take them out of the box for some time. Upon opening them, I found that they do not fit on a standard 2" barbell. I contacted the seller multiple times and have never received a response. I purchased the 10 lbs Rep Fitness bumper plates and those fit perfectly so I'd recommend looking elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: AG

customer_reviews.title: Purchase products from this brand. Legit.
customer_reviews.text: My son is able to do the sumo squats without cracking the cement and the plates does not crack either. It is a great on investment for our home gym
customer_reviews.author: Joann

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Really thank you to the deliveryman, this item is really heavy! This item is great!
customer_reviews.author: Rainie

customer_reviews.title: Don't fit standard barbell
customer_reviews.text: These do not fit the standard 2" barbell. I had to force them on the end of the bar and couldn't slide them more than an inch on the bar. Returned them due to false item description.
customer_reviews.author: Ivey

customer_reviews.title: As expected
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, weigh is accurate. They come with slight smell but so does most weight equipment, so just leave them to air outside or in the bathroom for a few days.
customer_reviews.author: Rob T.

customer_reviews.title: Haven't weighed them to get an accurate reading on the ...
customer_reviews.text: Haven't weighed them to get an accurate reading on the actual weight, but the oil and smell have finally started to go away. Not a big issue since they are kept in my garage. No splits or separation between the metal ring and the rubber plate itself. i use them on rubber mats and there is minimal bounce.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Carter

customer_reviews.title: Great Value Bumper Plates
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't bounce much, so I love them for deadlifting. I haven't dropped them yet but I've set them down hard with no sign of any issues. Good price and good quality.
customer_reviews.author: SR_123

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: You may think me crazy, but I know music. It's the one thing that makes me humble
customer_reviews.author: William Parks

customer_reviews.title: These arrived and surprisingly the box was in good shape too
customer_reviews.text: These arrived and surprisingly the box was in good shape too. The only issue is that these are making my bed room smell like a tire shop. I get a slight headache when going into my room right now. Hopefully the smell goes away soon. Other than that I'm looking forward to using them. I can deadlift more weight now without worrying about damaging the floor using normal plates.
customer_reviews.author: Terence P. Watson

customer_reviews.title: Top notch quality, great price.
customer_reviews.text: Very high quality. I trained for 5 years in a D1 collegiate weight room and these are comparable quality to what was used at my school. So far these have held up to being dropped from shoulder, and overhead height with no signs of wear.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Very good value for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I bought a couple of 45's two years ago, they have been great so far. It was the horrible smell but but it went away after a few months. To my supprise these two newly bought 45's there is no smell and that's great!
customer_reviews.author: toots

customer_reviews.title: Good Product for home gym.
customer_reviews.text: Great product and works very well. Will be great addition to our home gym.
customer_reviews.author: Merrisa MacGregor

customer_reviews.title: Best deal on amazon
customer_reviews.text: These weights are perfect for my home gym. I’m very happy that I picked these from all of the choices on amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Justin L.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These were a gift to my son and he really loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Runner

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Love these bumper plates. Quality similar to more expensive brands. Use them daily!
customer_reviews.author: Armywife150

customer_reviews.title: Buy them
customer_reviews.text: Great price and the free shipping made this a great buy. Usually weights are very expensive to ship, so Prime shipping really sealed the deal on it. They have a smoother finish than my Hi-Temp plates.
customer_reviews.author: SomethingWitty

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend.
customer_reviews.text: I bought a pair of 10 pounders back in March. I use them every other day and they are great. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: KCee

customer_reviews.title: Happy!!
customer_reviews.text: Needed a set of 10's that were more steady for tequinque. These do not fold over like cheaper plates, even in a hot garage! so far the metal collars are holding up strong. I would totally buy these again!
customer_reviews.author: No name

customer_reviews.title: Fits bar perfect and no issues
customer_reviews.text: Got and used for about a month now daily. Fits bar perfect and no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Great weights for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I have had a pair of these plates for a little while now, and I put them through the paces. They work great for all types of lifts that may require dropping the weights. I use them for Olympic weightlifting and they protect the concrete floors in my home gym.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great plates but a little smelly
customer_reviews.text: Great plates but a little smelly and the smell never really goes away, wife makes me keep them in the garage cause they stink up the house.
customer_reviews.author: Mr S

customer_reviews.title: Only came with one plate......
customer_reviews.text: Gave as a gift tonight...she opened it and it only came with one plate. Will be calling to address with customer service. Very, very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Product.
customer_reviews.text: These are exactly what I needed. Durable and strong, they do the job very well. Already ordered another pair and will more than likely be adding more in different weights. Great Product.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Good bumper plates
customer_reviews.text: Arrived earlier than expected and in good shape. They do have a bit of an odor to them but I don't notice it when I'm lifting.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Same quality as name brands,,, just not ...
customer_reviews.text: Same quality as name brands,,, just not the same price..... Bought two twenty five pound plates and have been dropping them from all positions including overhead. I have even added steel weights ands no issues dropping that either. Buy with confidence
customer_reviews.author: lfreda

customer_reviews.title: Haven’t used them long but loved that there’s no greasy feeling to them and they ...
customer_reviews.text: Haven’t used them long but loved that there’s no greasy feeling to them and they look and feel sturdy. Can’t wait to get some use out of them!
customer_reviews.author: Emily Spivey

customer_reviews.title: ... am a beginner crossfitter and these plates have been awesome. I have dropped them on the floor
customer_reviews.text: I am a beginner crossfitter and these plates have been awesome. I have dropped them on the floor, the grass and from above my head and they are holding up quite well. Very good product and would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Mirian Martinez

customer_reviews.title: ... in February 2017 and it is durable enough for easy oly drops
customer_reviews.text: I've used these since my purchase in February 2017 and it is durable enough for easy oly drops. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Em_S

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy. I didn't get the smell issue
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy. I didn't get the smell issue! I returned some other bumper plates I ordered off Amazon because they were so flimsy they would buckle under the weight of the bar. Not these.
customer_reviews.author: Rayzor B

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: So far they are working great haven't had any issues aside from the smell.
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: Great Bumpers
customer_reviews.text: These have held up great to the past year of abuse. I've used them for cleans, deads, press, etc. They have been dropped from chest height multiple times and are still as good as when purchased.Great bumper plates and super cheap compared to some other options out there.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice color, quick delivery, great for home gyms. Buying more next month!!!!
customer_reviews.author: RETIRED Border Cop

customer_reviews.title: great after years of use
customer_reviews.text: I've had these plates for more than 2 years and they are the best bang for the buck that I have ever seen. I have absolutely no complaints and plan to order more.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Shue

customer_reviews.title: they weigh exactly what i asked for and the smell ...
customer_reviews.text: they weigh exactly what i asked for and the smell everyone is talking about it part of the production im sure. it wears off.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: These training weights are the correct size for technique training.
customer_reviews.text: Best thing about them is that they are the correct size, matching the diameter of a 45# plate.
customer_reviews.author: Donald Veach

customer_reviews.title: And they look great. The only plates I'll buy from now on
customer_reviews.text: What a relief from the old-fashioned iron or steel plates. These are quiet! And they look great. The only plates I'll buy from now on.
customer_reviews.author: Nathaniel R. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Hole too small
customer_reviews.text: Hole is too small on one of my 10lb bumper plate to fit on some of my 2” olympic bars! Im gonna file it till it fits
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good quality bumper weights i did not have an issue with smell with mine
customer_reviews.author: Hardcore Homemaker

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: well made product, just wash well, the oil that covers it stinks ! wears off over time
customer_reviews.author: StoweBum

customer_reviews.title: these had a funny smell, that went away after a few days
customer_reviews.text: these had a funny smell, that went away after a few days. other than that, super solid. i work out on mats and drop these from over head . they are holding up great!
customer_reviews.author: rodger s.

customer_reviews.title: Good price
customer_reviews.text: Best deal I could find, slight odor which was gone in a few days. Cannot attest to how well the plates will stand up to dropping as we don't routinely drop the bars.
customer_reviews.author: jsb

customer_reviews.title: Headline - Look! Weights.
customer_reviews.text: They arrived on time. They weigh what they say they weigh. They fit the bar. Life is good.
customer_reviews.author: E. Lorelli

customer_reviews.title: These plates are good. I'd give them a 5, but they smell horrible so now a three.
customer_reviews.text: These plates are good. I'd give them a 5, but man they have a horrid smell. I just put them out in the garage as others have to see if a few days will allow the smell to dissipate. Anyone who is sensitive to strong chemical smells will have a hard time with these until the smell is gone. Edit: Over one month in and they still smell a little. Better, but the smell is still there. It is nasty. Bumping the rating down to a three. I expect in another month they won't smell. There's got to be something wrong with the manufacturing process that produces such a horrid smell that lasts so long.
customer_reviews.author: Shizzle Fodrizzle

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase and good price.
customer_reviews.text: Great for the price and is eligible for Prime shipping. My wife uses these with the olympic bar to train her deadlifting until she can manage heavier weight. We've dropped them on the floor when the plates are on the bar, and they will hold up as good bumper plates should.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Great product but make sure to note that it comes by its self. I thought they lost one when shipped until I realized you buy each plate separately!
customer_reviews.author: Joshua W.

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Dimensions are correct, fairly dead rubber so not too high of bounce. Durable so far
customer_reviews.author: Lightning Hopkins

customer_reviews.title: Had to off gas them outside for like a week
customer_reviews.text: OK for price. Had to off gas them outside for like a week. Still have a residual odor....but the Rouge plates I bought do too and were much more $$$
customer_reviews.author: April Hillaert

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Stinky product. Had to leave them outside and they still smell!
customer_reviews.author: Vonni

customer_reviews.title: Great deal
customer_reviews.text: Very nice quality. It did smell strong for a few days.
customer_reviews.author: Sld

customer_reviews.title: Great weights and a great price
customer_reviews.text: Great weights and I haven't had an issue with them. Fit the bar well and don't wobble.
customer_reviews.author: P. Chavez

customer_reviews.title: Excellent bumper plates!  Well made
customer_reviews.text: Excellent bumper plates! Well made. I'm not a monster, but I do heavier lifting than most. In my Crossfit class I was certainly in the top 25% or higher. This weight takes the abuse and gives it right back. After a month of use, no signs at all of wear and tear. I'm using this in my home garage gym on a matted floor. I expect this weight to last many years to come. The weight ships with some sort of light oil preservative on it. I used a shop towel and wiped it mostly dry. The rest came off during the workouts. I'd buy again.
customer_reviews.author: kparrent

customer_reviews.title: Product met expectations
customer_reviews.text: These weights were priced well and met my expectations. I would order again from this company.
customer_reviews.author: Patti Courtney

customer_reviews.title: Great set of bumper plates
customer_reviews.text: Love these! Great quality, affordable price. Will be buying more of these in the near future!
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great weight but smells real bad. I wish I knew how to get the small out
customer_reviews.author: Savvy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great for the price. takes a beating. well worth the money
customer_reviews.author: a k

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: So far so good, have used it a few times.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Shut up and lift!!!
customer_reviews.text: These plates are great, especially for the price SHIPPED FREE!!!!! And I'm in Hawaii!! All the people complaining about the smell, it GOES AWAY!!! And it goes away quite fast, especially if left outside for a bit. The ones you buy at the fitness store probably came with the same smell but they just say in the store long enough to lose it. These are pretty much sent to you straight from the factory. Thee plates are very solid and work great for CrossFit/high rep exercises. Very tough. I haven't put a scratch or deny on them yet. Fits my bar collars great. Shut up and lift!!
customer_reviews.author: FreshmanGREEN

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality - especially for the price
customer_reviews.text: Very solid, little to no smell. Metal inner ring very smooth, high quality. Low bounce. Very happy with purchse
customer_reviews.author: Jason Tobin

customer_reviews.title: Love the weights and the feel of them is better ...
customer_reviews.text: Excelllent. Love the weights and the feel of them is better than the typical metal.
customer_reviews.author: pete

customer_reviews.title: Good choice for first bumper set
customer_reviews.text: Great fit for my squat rack/ deadlift set did have a rubber smell first few days similar to the horse stall mats I put down but nothing crazy stinky
customer_reviews.author: Mark N.

customer_reviews.title: Quality Plates. Quality Price.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice quality. Would for sure recommend. Drop them on concrete during deadlifts and cleans without issues.
customer_reviews.author: Jake bishop

customer_reviews.title: Missing plate
customer_reviews.text: Plates are great but I only received one 10lb plate
customer_reviews.author: hshsh

customer_reviews.title: Great seller!!
customer_reviews.text: This got shipped to me super fast. The 10lb weights are exactly what I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Tony Cha

customer_reviews.title: Weighed 10 lbs on the nose.
customer_reviews.text: Both plates weighed 10 lbs each on the nose. So far, they have worked great.
customer_reviews.author: 1fromtx

customer_reviews.title: Great quality weights
customer_reviews.text: These are exactly as described. I didn't have any problems, no harsh smell, and we bought these a while ago and they are holding up like new. The only reason I gave it 4 stars instead of 5 because they are huge. But they are much cheaper than a smaller thickness of weight. I won't buy these again when I need more weight but only because I want something more compact. They are perfect for a starter gym, or someone who is looking to spend a little less money.
customer_reviews.author: anaroselee

customer_reviews.title: Accurate weight, very round shape
customer_reviews.text: This bumper plate is nearly perfectly round and weighs as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: ben jongenelen

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love these! Easy on the hands and the floor if u have to drop a barbell.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy two

customer_reviews.title: Smelly
customer_reviews.text: They are still smelly after a few weeks. Other than that, they are fine.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: A++
customer_reviews.text: I'm definitely going to buy this brand if I need any more bumper plates.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Awesome bumper plates!
customer_reviews.text: Plates are great for the price and seem to be of great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Levi Rivers

customer_reviews.title: Nice bumpers, though a smelly at first.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quick and item as expected - a pair of bumpers that fit the Olympic bar. They feel solid and rubbery and true to the weight. I use them for dead lifts and rows and they got a bit of a bounce to them. As others said, these plates smell like plastic. After opening the package they smell of these plates gave me a headache and needed to be used in an open area. However after a few days they smell goes away.
customer_reviews.author: AwkwardSoul

customer_reviews.title: Good weights
customer_reviews.text: I have been using them for about 2 months and they work. I drop them and they keep going.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Whittaker

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great quality bumper plates. I'm very happy with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Aniko Adams

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good plate for the price. Fits a standard Oly bar well. Will definitely buy more from this company.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Shropshire

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and reliable
customer_reviews.text: Not flimsy and made to drop if/when you need to
customer_reviews.author: Greg Aguilar

customer_reviews.title: Great weights for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great weights for the price! They fit snugly on the bar and seem durable, I use them primarily for power cleans and deadlifts in my driveway and they have held up well so far
customer_reviews.author: Jesse Barry

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are a great asset to my husband's training business
customer_reviews.author: Dawn L.

customer_reviews.title: I think it is a great value plate
customer_reviews.text: arrived as described and on time. I think it is a great value plate.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff H

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Came in excellent condition, same as previously ordered 15lb plate set. Happy to up my bar another 50lbs.
customer_reviews.author: Weiß

product_meta.title: X Training Equipment Premium Black Bumper Plate Solid Rubber with Steel Insert - Great for Crossfit Workouts
feature_bullets: Pro grade: Trust the brand found in commercial gyms across the US. X Training olympic plates outperform the competition.

Solid Construction: Go ahead and PR that lift without worrying about your plates. Designed for low bounce and high durability, X Training odorless bumpers are constructed of 100% solid rubber to withstand punishment during any strength training or fitness workout from deadlift to max rep lifts.
Fits Olympic Bar: X Training weight plates fit standard 2 inch olympic barbells, including hex trap bars. The steel inserts guarantee a snug fit.

Strong warranty: X Training guarantees our products shall be free material defects in workmanship and materials under normal use and conditions during the warranty period. 10lb and 15lb plates are covered for six months. 25lb, 35lb, and 45lb plates are covered for three years. The warranty does not cover ordinary wear and tear or cosmetic damage.
